name: One Down, One Million To Go
description: Kill a pest for the very first time.

name: Hackerman
description: Hack a door or other security feature.

name: Green Thumb
description: Cultivate any crop

name: Down Under
description: You've taken your first steps into the GATE Cascade Research Facility.

name: Office: Managed
description: You've scrambled through the Office Sector with barely a papercut.

name: Synced Up
description: You've bored your way into Manufacturing West and engineered an escape.

name: Regaining Control
description: You've broken free of containment failures and explored beyond the Cascade Laboratories.

name: Accidents Happen
description: You didn't make it to the toilet in time.

name: Crafty Creations
description: You created your very first item, all by yourself, probably.

name: Kitted Out
description: Equip an item into every available slot, at the same time.

name: Fashion Spec
description: Equip a complete armor set with a unique buff.

name: Mycelium about the Consilium
description: Enjoy the dreams of the Mycofields.

name: Supremus Ordo Petrae
description: Take down 50 combatants from The Order, by any means available.

name: Lab Rat
description: Never go full rat.

name: Engineering Success
description: Collect the full Manufacturing uniform.

name: Survive the Night
description: You faced the dark of Security Sector and came out the other side, different, but alive.

name: The Darkwater
description: You've reactivated the Hydroplant and are battle-hardened as a result.

name: Je Suis Perdu!
description: You've had one heck of a ski holiday.

name: We Don't Talk About That Place
description: You found yourself upon some distant shore...

name: No Running
description: You've sat in the Red Chair.

name: No More Room In Helmholtz
description: You've lingered through an apocalypse.

name: Flat as a Pancake
description: You've wandered into a reflection of another reality.

name: Sleepwalking
description: You've drifted through the Night Realm.

name: Field of Dreams
description: You've leapt through the mushrooms of the Mycofields.

name: It Only Gets Stranger From Here
description: You've taken your first steps into the worlds beyond our own.

name: All Aboard
description: You've taken a journey aboard IS-0138.

name: The Composers
description: You've ventured to Flathill and it left you misty-eyed.

name: The Big Apple
description: You've seen how the other half lives. Turns out, not very well.

name: Dummy
description: You've found a familiar friend in a familiar place. Nothing out of the Ordo here.

name: Catch a Fish
description: You've successfully caught a fish, but it isn't quite what you expected!

name: Rare Catch
description: You've fished up something rare! Lucky you.

name: Go With The Flow
description: Collect the full Hydroplant uniform.

name: A Lode Off My Mind
description: You've met the excitable locals at the seaside hamlet of Canaan.

name: Rumble on the Royal Range
description: You've completed a chilling chapter of a long lost video game.

name: The Village
description: You've stumbled across something alien, and something ancient.

name: Dawn Til' Dusk
description: One by one, you get the job done.

name: Dark Energy
description: You descended into the depths of the Reactors. You feel renewed and full of energy... And something more.

name: Shadowgate
description: You uncovered something dark in the forests of the north.

name: Coreverse
description: You survived the Encroachment of Anteverse 299, and restored a bit of hope in a dimly lit cavern... There may yet be more to explore.
